content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STRESC
      operator: not_empty
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: --STRESU
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0425
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if --STRESU is null when --STRESC ^= null and units are
  applicable for the result
Outcome:
  Message: --STRESU is null when --STRESC ^= null and units are applicable for the
    result
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0425
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'The unit of measure for the standardized result of
                  the measurement, test, or examination.  Variable(s) Qualified: --STRESC
                  and --STRESN and --STNRLO and --STNRHI and --STREFC and --STREFN
                  and --LLOQ and --ULOQ.'
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --STRESU
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error if --STRESU is null when --STRESC ^= null and units are applicable for the result

Outcome.Message: --STRESU is null when --STRESC ^= null and units are applicable for the result

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The unit of measure for the standardized result of the measurement, test, or examination.  Variable(s) Qualified: --STRESC and --STRESN and --STNRLO and --STNRHI and --STREFC and --STREFN and --LLOQ and --ULOQ.
